text: Luis Gómez-Montejano (24 August 1922 - 5 February 2017) was a Spanish football executive. He was the President of Real Madrid from 26 April to 3 July 2006. He was born in Madrid. Gómez-Montejano died on 5 February 2017 at the age of 94. ==References== Category:1922 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Madrid
title: Luis Gómez-Montejano
